# AZDIGI Website Content

> AZDIGI (azdigi.com) - Vietnamese web hosting and cloud services provider.

This repository contains markdown exports of all pages from azdigi.com sitemap for LLM/RAG usage.

## Content Overview

- **Total pages:** 109 markdown files
- **Languages:** Vietnamese (primary), English (/en/ prefix)
- **Last updated:** 2026-01-20

## Topics Covered

### Hosting Services
- NVMe Hosting, WordPress Hosting, Business Hosting
- Pro Hosting, Pro Platinum Hosting
- Reseller Hosting, SEO Hosting, Unlimited Hosting

### Cloud & VPS
- AMD Cloud Server, Platinum Cloud Server
- Pro VPS, X-Platinum VPS, GPU VPS
- AZ Cloud Storage

### Other Services
- Domain registration (ten-mien)
- SSL Certificates (chung-chi-ssl)
- Email Hosting & Email Server
- cPanel/DirectAdmin licenses
- N8N automation platform

### Solutions (giai-phap/)
- AI Chatbot, CRM, ERP
- E-commerce, Landing Page, Blog
- Corporate websites

### Policies & Info
- Terms of service (dieu-khoan-su-dung)
- Privacy policy, Refund policy
- Quality commitment, About us, Contact

## File Naming Convention

- Vietnamese: `{slug}.md` (e.g., `nvme-hosting.md`)
- English: `en-{slug}.md` (e.g., `en-nvme-hosting.md`)

## Pricing Information

All pricing pages contain VND amounts. Look for patterns:
- `XX.000đ /tháng` (monthly)
- `XX.000đ /năm` (yearly)

## Usage Notes

When querying this data:
1. Vietnamese pages have more detailed content
2. English pages are translations (may have slight differences)
3. Pricing is in Vietnamese Dong (VND)
4. Product specs include: vCPU, RAM, Storage, Bandwidth
